# mergeLocales() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Utility function for custom functions. Merge the locales set for the message, an `options` property on the input, and the `locale` option of the expression.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function mergeLocales(locales: string[], input: unknown, options: Record<string, unknown> | null): string[];
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  locales | string\[\] |  |
|  input | unknown |  |
|  options | Record&lt;string, unknown&gt; \| null |  |

**Returns:**

string\[\]
